      • filterBlastResults

        public SearchResults filterBlastResults(String userId,
                               int start,
                               int count,
                               HashMap<String,SearchResult> blastResults)
        Intended to be called after running a blast search to filter the results. Blast search runs on a fasta file which contains all the sequences. Hibernate search has a security filter for permissions and is therefore used to filter out the blast results, as well as to filter based on the entry attributes not handled by blast; such as "has sequence" and "bio-safety level"
        Parameters:
        userId - identifier for account of user performing search
        start - paging start
        count - maximum number of results to return
        blastResults - raw results of the blast search
        Returns:
        wrapper around list of filtered results

      • checkEnableSecurityFilter

        protected org.hibernate.search.FullTextQuery checkEnableSecurityFilter(String userId,
                                                           org.hibernate.search.FullTextQuery fullTextQuery)
        Enables the security filter if the account does not have administrative privileges
        Parameters:
        userId - identifier for account which is checked for administrative privs
        fullTextQuery - search fulltextquery for which filter is enabled
